item.description:
Finally our first Rhythmic Explorationsâ„¢ class of the winter at Springstep!
This is a free "sample" class so please feel welcome to come and see if you like it.
We will explore hand-drum techniques and rhythms from all around the globe!
Drum are provided and we have a beautiful warm space for our class!
Plenty of parking in the parking lots

This is the first class of a 6-week/class cycle.
The Cambridge classes have been starting with a BANG!
If you are into hand drumming, don't miss out on this class!

Please feel free to contact me with any questions.

Zach Nazar
617 755 9618
Rhythminaut@gmail.com
RhythmicExplorations.com
Click ^ to visit the website
Registation is easy, check the "Courses for Adults" page!
item.name: 1st free "sample" World hand-drumming class @ Springstep
